credit_line: Selection from the Peterson Collection, Gift of William Bingham II
dimensions:
Overall: 13 9/16 x 18 5/8 in. (34.5 x 47.3 cm)
thickness: 1 3/8 in. (3.5 cm)
title: Album of paintings of Arhats or LO-hans
description: Done in the style of a famous eighteenth century artist. Calligraphy is signed the name of the famous artist, but it is not actually by this artist.
